Message:
Who knew wearing myself out
fighting would be this painful...

With the enemy surrounding us,
running away felt like too much
of a hassle, so I did my best
to protect the rear...

...Hehe. Guess I shouldn’t fight
in ways I’m not used to, huh...?

There it was.
The same voice as back then—
the voice of the sword.

Sorry... Looks like I’m not
gonna be around to find
your master after all...

But, it’s okay
for me to go, right...?
I can’t keep my eyes open
much longer...

“This will mark the second
time I save your life.”

As everything faded to black...
it felt as if the sword was
shining brightly.
